faqs.question: What is the purpose of this FAQ?
faqs.answer: This FAQ provides answers to common questions about the accordion component.

faqs.question: How do I use the accordion?
faqs.answer: You can use the accordion by importing it into your project and following the usage instructions provided in the documentation.

faqs.question: Can I customize the styles of the accordion?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can customize the styles using CSS or by passing style props to the component.

faqs.question: Is the accordion accessible?
faqs.answer: Yes, the accordion is designed with accessibility in mind and follows best practices for keyboard navigation and screen readers.
